name: Design of Experiments
description: To design a task that studies the relationship between input and output variables

templates.name: Overview
templates.description: Overview board for design of experiments templates
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=doe_overview

templates.name: Bayesian Optimization
templates.description: To optimize the parameters using a bayesian model
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=bayesian_optimization

templates.name: Bayesian Modelling
templates.description: To estimate the parameters by modelling parametrized equations
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=bayesian_modelling

templates.name: Classical Doe
templates.description: To estimate the parameters if all trials have to be run in parallel
templates.command: cookiecutter https://github.com/erium/welcome --no-input --directory use_case_templates/design_of_experiments --output-dir {{output-dir}} timestamp={{timestamp}} author_name={{user.name}} use_case_name=classical_doe
